channel.title: Help with ::setstats
channel.description:
i have the code for it and it's working however, i want it to be a global command(meaning anyone can use it)
can someone tell me how to do that?
also i have the same problem with ::online

item.title: Help with ::setstats
item.dc:creator: @bigh51 bigh51
item.description:
@bigh51 wrote:

[quote=“xEnt, post:5, topic:232885”][quote author=AFLjunkie link=topic=307139.msg2456212#msg2456212 date=1222252766]
hey,

U have 2 go into CLient.java and find all ur commands by pressing ctrl+f and searching public void customCommand(String command)

Once u have done that they r all in ther…

And then near the end of each command Player Rights comes up.

On a normal source. A just created player without mod rights owner/co-owner they cannot use commands with (rights = 1/2/3) etc

So if u wanted the whole server to be able to use commands u wuld change rights to ‘0’

Hope it helped,
Kory
[/quote]
Shut up idiot.[/quote]+1

Read full topic

@AFLjunkie wrote:

hey,

U have 2 go into CLient.java and find all ur commands by pressing ctrl+f and searching public void customCommand(String command)

Once u have done that they r all in ther…

And then near the end of each command Player Rights comes up.

On a normal source. A just created player without mod rights owner/co-owner they cannot use commands with (rights = 1/2/3) etc

So if u wanted the whole server to be able to use commands u wuld change rights to ‘0’

Hope it helped,
